mapper.select: select c.MENUID,c.MENUPID,c.Menuname,c.URL from ROLEPOWER a,powers b,menu c where a.roleid=(select roleid from emprole where empid=#{id}) and a.POWERID=b.POWERID and b.MENUID=c.MENUID
select * from MENU where MENUID in(select c.MENUPID from ROLEPOWER a,powers b,menu c where a.roleid=(select roleid from emprole where empid=#{id}) and a.POWERID=b.POWERID and b.MENUID=c.MENUID )
